name: nce
description: > 一个现代化的新概念英语在线学习平台，支持音频播放、中英文字幕同步、学习进度跟踪等功能。

scripts.optimize: npm run minify-js && npm run minify-css
scripts.preview: npm run build && npx serve www -l 8000
scripts.build:android: npm run build && npm run sync:android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.build:android:release: npm run build && npm run sync:android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.build:ios: npm run build && npm run sync:ios && npx cap open ios
scripts.build:electron: npm run build && npm run sync:electron && cd electron && npm run build
scripts.build:all: ./build.sh && npm run build:android && npm run build:electron
scripts.validate: npm run lint:check && npm run format:check
scripts.clean: rm -rf www dist android/app/build ios/build electron/dist
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
